summary: Identified 3 actual bugs: nil check missing in move function (main.lua:1502), incorrect keymap syntax in search UI (search.lua:781), and wrong function name in send handler (ui.lua:398). The d/r/R errors are not bugs - they are expected cursor-position behavior.

artifacts.summary: Research report documenting 3 bugs with line-level fixes and verification that d/r/R errors are working as designed

next_steps: Run /plan 64 to create implementation plan for the 3 identified bugs
